events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your background and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically the software development team, for further consideration.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening of your qualifications and are pleased with your background. Next step is the technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt reply and confirmation of availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and reach out with any questions.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career expectations.
The HR interview went very well, and your alignment with the company's values and goals was noted positively by the team.
An official offer has been proposed to you, outlining compensation, benefits, and start date options. We look forward to your response.
We have received your feedback expressing enthusiasm about the offer and interest in joining the engineering team.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will begin onboarding preparations immediately.
The onboarding process has officially started with documentation sent and initial meetings scheduled to integrate you smoothly.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome to the Engineering team! We are confident you will make great contributions.
